thread.title: 21 Savage Pumped Hearing Jay Z Line About Him On DJ Khaled's "Shining"
thread.title_full: 21 Savage Pumped Hearing Jay Z Line About Him On DJ Khaled's "Shining"

author: Zakk Feig
title: 21 Savage Pumped Hearing Jay Z Line About Him On DJ Khaled's "Shining"
text:
Home > Music > 21 Savage Pumped Hearing Jay Z Line About Him On DJ Khaled's "Shining" 21 Savage Pumped Hearing Jay Z Line About Him On DJ Khaled's "Shining" 0 0 Posted by Zakk Feig , Feb 17, 2017 at 07:43pm 21 Savage is amped cause who wouldn't. 
You may have noticed Jay Z shouted out 21 Savage on DJ Khaled 's newest single "Shining." If you were wondering how 21 felt about it, wonder no further. 
Footage has surfaced of 21 Savage rocking out to Jay's bars, and it looks like he feel like he finally made it. 
Check out the video of 21 Savage geeking out via DJ Khaled's Instagram below, and let us know your thoughts in the comments section. Do you think Hov and 21 might hop on a track together? Would the puppeteers of the universe even allow for that? A post shared by DJ KHALED (@djkhaled) on Feb 15, 2017 at 10:04pm PST < class="robots-nocontent" rel=""> Feb 17, 2017 at 07:43pm 0 Views 
Allen Iverson and 2 Chainz do not drink cheap alcohol. 21 Savage is amped cause who wouldn't. 
You may have noticed Jay Z shouted out 21 Savage on DJ Khaled 's newest single "Shining." If you were wondering how 21 felt about it, wonder no further. 
Footage has surfaced of 21 Savage rocking out to Jay's bars, and it looks like he feel like he finally made it.
